text: Blauvelt is a hamlet and census-designated place, formerly known as Greenbush and then Blauveltville, in the town of Orangetown, Rockland County, New York, United States. As of the 2020 census, the CDP had a population of 5,548. ==References== Category:Hamlets in New York (state) Category:Census-designated places in New York (state)
title: Blauvelt, New York
